testcase.name: Register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given initialize register feature...........................................passed When user press register icon...............................................passed And user selects "male" and enters "ahmed" as first name, "basiouny" as last name, "ahmed@basiuny.com" as email, "ssv" as company, "ahmed123" as password and "ahmed123" as confirm password.passed And user set his birthday as follow "10" Day "4" Month "1990" Year..........passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then successful registration message appears................................passed
